question: I saw a dream in which I was being attacked by a jinn, and I kept reciting ayatul kursi and I think after I ran away from jinn I was under a white sheet
answer:
QUESTION
I did isitkhara the nite before on wether or not I should marry this girl,because my parents arent willingly accepting it due to her immigration problems, the girl is also pious and hijabi, I saw a dream in which I was being attacked by a jinn, and I kept reciting ayatul kursi and I think after I ran away from jinn I was under a white sheet and I was reciting ayatul kursi over and over again. Does this dream have any relevance to my istikhara on marrying the girl. Plz help I am soo confused Allah hafiz
ANSWER


Share:
Reciting Aayatul Kursi is a protection against all difficulties and evils,
especially the evils of Jinns and Shaytaan.

Continue reciting Aayaatul Kursi, Allah willing, the difficulties from the
immigration will also be removed. If the obstacles are not removed, you
should accept that as Allah's will and Taqdeer.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
